alert.note: Alert for Inner Channels from Kupreanof Island to Etolin Island; Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 31 at 6:27AM AKST until January 01 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 18 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Juneau, Petersburg, Wrangell, and Whale Pass. * WHEN...From 9 AM Friday to noon AKST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Greatest snowfall rates will occur from noon Friday through 3 AM Saturday morning.
info.instruction: A warning means that a winter storm is already occurring or imminent. This storm could pose a threat to life and property. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.

area.areaDesc: Inner Channels from Kupreanof Island to Etolin Island; Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island
